title: vantharulvaai
sahitya:
vantharuLvaai vanamaali varam
thantharuLvaai dhinam unaith thudhiththida
 [vantharuL]
anupallavi

mandharam thaangiya sundhara charaNaa
endhai ezhil mEni uppiliappaa  
[vantharul]
caraNam

vaa vaa endhanukku vaazhvaLiththida vENum
vaaraadhu en vinai nOkki aaraayum nEramO idhu
naaraayaNaa hari thiruvaruL thanthiduvaai
yaar enaik kaaththiduvaar thiruviNNagraanE
[vantharuL]
